tweets.text: A powerful moment in tonight’s debate was when @JoeBiden attacked what might be Bernie Sanders’ biggest Achilles heel: his poor record on gun safety.  https://t.co/oqMv32ENLP

We don’t just have a gun problem; we have a violence problem. We should have as stringent gun safety legislation as possible within purview of 2nd Amendment, but we should also have a Dept. of Peace to deal with underlying social issues that make eruption of violence inevitable.

A member of our well regulated militia uses a gun to wound his ex-wife and to murder her boyfriend while his 5 and 10 year old kids were present. He breaks into a stranger’s home a few miles away and uses the gun to kill himself in the shower of the home. https://t.co/pUZ4wOelBw

When it comes to the crisis of gun violence, there’s no debate: No one has done more to confront the NRA than I have. 

I built a grassroots movement to pass common sense gun safety laws. 

I’ve taken on the gun lobby — and won.
